titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the exclusion from gross income for qualified scholarships does not apply to athletic scholarships if the recipient receives certain income derived from the recipient's name, image, or likeness.
NIL Scholarship Tax Act
NIL Scholarship Tax Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
NIL Scholarship Tax Act
This bill denies the tax exclusion for qualified scholarships income to recipients of athletic scholarships at institutions of higher education who receive income in excess of $20,000 from their name, image or likeness in a taxable year.
